pullrequest.title: Initial SRC cloudsim gazebo docker container

content.raw: I think this should be prefixed with `sudo`. After installation docker requires a root user to run it. A user can add themselves to the docker group, but they may not want to do so because it effectively gives their account root access to the system through the docker socket.
content.html: I think this should be prefixed with sudo. After installation docker requires a root user to run it. A user can add themselves to the docker group, but they may not want to do so because it effectively gives their account root access to the system through the docker socket.
